programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers (2006)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Patriot Games (1992)
programme.desc: An IRA terrorist (Sean Bean) vows revenge against the ex-CIA agent (Harrison Ford) who killed the mans brother and thwarted an attack on royalty.

programme.title: Hostage (2005)
programme.desc: A former hostage negotiator (Bruce Willis) must take action when three carjackers hold a wealthy man (Kevin Pollak) and his children at gunpoint.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: Snag (2023)
programme.desc: After learning the woman he once loved is being held captive by ruthless gangsters, a lone wolf seeks out allies and storms into a world of violence to rescue her.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: On the Edge (2022)
programme.desc: A metro driver witnesses his son die and sets out to track down those who are responsible.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
programme.desc: After shooting the man who murdered his wife, a Danish settler (Mads Mikkelsen) incurs the wrath of the mans brother (Jeffrey Dean Morgan), a ruthless land baron who rules their frontier town.

programme.title: The Return (2024)
programme.desc: After 20 years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca. The king finds much has changed since he left to fight in the Trojan War. No longer the mighty warrior his people remember, Odysseus must face his past to save his family.

programme.title: The Return (2024)
programme.desc: After 20 years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca. The king finds much has changed since he left to fight in the Trojan War. No longer the mighty warrior his people remember, Odysseus must face his past to save his family.

programme.title: Monstrous (2022)
programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: Mercy (2023)
programme.desc: An ex-military doctor finds herself in a fight for survival when the Irish mafia seizes control of the hospital at which she works. When her son is taken hostage, shes forced to rely on her battle-hardened past and lethal skills to save the day.

programme.title: American Psycho (2000)
programme.desc: A mentally unhinged yuppie (Christian Bale) in 1980s New York submits to an uncontrollable bloodlust.

programme.title: American Psycho 2 (2002)
programme.desc: Obsessed with serial killers, a college student (Mila Kunis) resorts to murder in order to become a professors teaching assistant.

programme.title: Rounders (1998)
programme.desc: The release of his debt-ridden pal (Edward Norton) from jail spurs a law student (Matt Damon) to resume high-stakes gambling.

programme.title: Gods Petting You (2022)
programme.desc: A heroin addict falls in love with a struggling sex addict, and together the pair hatch a plan to steal a small fortune from a porn star.

programme.title: Extra Ordinary (2019)
programme.desc: A woman who has supernatural abilities must save a possessed girl.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles (2001)
programme.desc: Mick (Paul Hogan) and his girlfriend (Linda Kozlowski) return to America and link the mysterious death of a reporter to a movie studio.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee (1986)
programme.desc: A rich reporter tours outback Australia with a crocodile hunter, then brings him to Manhattan.

programme.title: Rolling Like Thunder
programme.desc: Stories of myth-like artists, remarkable romances and competitive battles reveal the risk behind freight train and graffiti culture.

programme.title: Confess, Fletch (2022)
programme.desc: While investigating a case of stolen paintings, the roguishly charming and endlessly troublesome Fletch becomes the prime suspect in a murder. To prove his innocence, he must sift through a long list of suspects -- including his own girlfriend.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: Golda (2023)
programme.desc: During the Yom Kippur War in 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir must navigate overwhelming odds, a skeptical cabinet, and a complex relationship with U.S. Secretary of State Henry Kissinger as millions of lives hang in the balance.

programme.title: Parallel (2024)
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Freedoms Path (2022)
programme.desc: When Union soldier William runs from battle, hes taken to safety by a heroic young Black man. Kitch is part of a secret community of freed slaves running a section of the Underground Railroad, but a desperate slave catcher is on their trail.

programme.title: The Contractor (2022)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo (2011)
programme.sub-title: The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo (2011)
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist (Daniel Craig) and an investigator (Rooney Mara) for a security firm probe a 40-year-old murder.

programme.title: Lust and Redemption (2023)
programme.desc: A ranch owner named Samantha rejects an offer from a rich land developer, but her daughter falls for the developers hot son. A surprising discovery is made as help comes from an unexpected source.

programme.title: Hardcore Henry (2015)
programme.desc: A half-human, half-robotic hybrid embarks on a bloody rampage through Moscow to save his kidnapped wife (Haley Bennett) from a madman (Danila Kozlovsky) and his army of thugs.

programme.title: Resistance: 1942 (2021)
programme.desc: Caught behind enemy lines in 1942, a small group of resistance fighters broadcast a message of hope to fellow survivors over the radio as they try to avoid the Gestapo.

programme.title: The Return (2024)
programme.desc: After 20 years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca. The king finds much has changed since he left to fight in the Trojan War. No longer the mighty warrior his people remember, Odysseus must face his past to save his family.

programme.title: The Four Feathers (2002)
programme.desc: Accused of cowardice for resigning when assigned to a dangerous post, a former British soldier (Heath Ledger) tries to help his old regiment fight rebels in Africa.

programme.title: Marathon Man (1976)
programme.desc: The CIA and a Nazi death-camp dentist (Laurence Olivier) chase a New York graduate student (Dustin Hoffman).

programme.title: The Lookout (2007)
programme.desc: A brain-damaged former athlete (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) finds himself pulled into a heist at the bank where he works as a janitor.

programme.title: Good Kill (2014)
programme.desc: An Air Force drone pilot (Ethan Hawke) begins to question the ethics of dropping bombs on Afghanistan from the safety of his post in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Allied (2016)
programme.desc: World War II operative Max Vatan (Brad Pitt) falls for French Resistance fighter Marianne Beausejour (Marion Cotillard) during a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Reunited in London, a devastating secret tests their love and loyalty to each other.

programme.title: Total Recall (1990)
programme.desc: Recurring nightmares of the planet Mars lead a confused earthling into the center of an intergalactic conspiracy.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
